Nav docs¶

class NavAPI(flightplandb)¶

Commands related to navigation aids and airports. Accessed via nav().

airport(icao: str) → flightplandb.datatypes.Airport¶

Fetches information about an airport.

Parameters

icao (str) -- The airport ICAO to fetch information for

Returns

Airport if the airport was found.

Return type

Union[Airport, None]

Raises

NotFoundException -- No airport with the specified ICAO code was found.

nats() → List[flightplandb.datatypes.Track]¶

Fetches current North Atlantic Tracks.

Returns

List of NATs

Return type

List[Track]

pacots() → List[flightplandb.datatypes.Track]¶

Fetches current Pacific Organized Track System tracks.

Returns

List of PACOTs

Return type

List[Track]

search(query: str, type_: Optional[str] = None) → Generator[flightplandb.datatypes.SearchNavaid, None, None]¶

Searches navaids using a query.

Parameters

  • query (str) -- The search query. Searches the navaid identifier and navaid name

  • type_ (str) -- Navaid type. Must be either None (default value, returns all types) or one of validtypes

Yields

Generator[Navaid, None, None] -- A generator of navaids with either a name or ident matching the query
